short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your browsing experience with peaceful meditation sounds on every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need to relax and concentrate? Dive into this relaxing extension and let the sounds flow to your soul.
By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install MeditationSounds extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use. 
Privacy Policy - https://serve-o-lution.com/Privacy-Policy-1/
Terms and Conditions - https://serve-o-lution.com/Terms/

Disclaimer - All the images and backgrounds of MeditationSounds extension are sourced from Unsplash, and are entirely free to use under the Unsplash license - unsplash.com/license

You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall
